articles.author: Richard Henderson, Anand Krishnamoorthy
articles.title: US Stock Futures Jump on China Trade Deal Progress: Markets Wrap - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Signs that the US and China were nearing a trade deal triggered a cross-asset rally, lifting stocks, oil and copper along with China-exposed currencies such as the Australian dollar. Treasuries and gold dropped.
